In the year 2150, spacecraft Athena is preparing for lift-off from the Surya Space Center in the Thar Desert, India, for its crucial mission to the outer rim of the galaxy. You have been handpicked by the National Space Agency of India to lead this team of elite astronauts in search of new resources to replenish the failing resources on Earth. As you ascend the steps to the spacecraft, you pause to take one last look at the vast landscape before you.

1) Enter the spacecraft.
2) Talk to your fellow astronauts before entering.
3) Inspect the exterior of the spacecraft one last time.
4) Request mission updates from Mission Control.
